attributes.action: Conduct health impact assessment of the effects of global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further to the numerous petitions looking for practical solutions to global warming (eg. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/accept-it/), the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to conduct a health impact assessment of the effects of global warming. In support the excellent work of Al Gore in the U.K. this may offer more realistic goals than the millennium development goals have proved to be, assess, thereby monitor and improve the epidemiological health outcomes, alleviating the human suffering caused by global warming - basically a policy shift in emphasis from tomorrow to today. Many projects (eg LSTM malaria consortium) are already underway - but these are disease specific.
